meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one thousandth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: I measured the resistance of the circuit in milliohms.
meanings.sent2: The multimeter displayed a reading of two milliohms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the milliohm go to school? To get a little ohm-work done!
meanings.sent4: The milliohm was a tiny roadblock in the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent5: The milliohm was like a minuscule mountain for the electrons to climb over.
